content: I'm a Product Manager with experience spanning Big Tech and early-stage startups. Currently serving as the sole PM at a seed-stage startup, I’m deeply passionate about AI and its potential to transform how we build and use technology. My journey has taken me to the exciting intersection of product development and artificial intelligence, where I’m continuously sharpening my skills—exploring cutting-edge tools and coding with Cursor to create meaningful, AI-powered products that solve real-world problems.
